original_title: WatchWord Bible: The Gospel of Mark
overview: The oldest and shortest Gospel to be written, Mark highlights the amazing three-year ministry of Jesus, beginning with his baptism in the Jordan River by his cousin, John the Baptist, and his 40-day temptation in the wilderness by Satan. Mark is packed with stories demonstrating that Jesus truly was the Son of God in the flesh - with divine power over death, disease and the devil. Here you will meet the Jesus who awed his disciples and the crowds with his miracles and teaching.
title: WatchWord Bible: The Gospel of Mark
